sentences.en: A queen bee uses her stinger only to sting another queen bee.
sentences.cn: 蜂后只用她的螫针螫另外一只蜂后.

sentences.en: Captain Price: Soap! Grab a Stinger and take out that chopper! Move!
sentences.cn: 普莱斯队长: 索普! 拿“毒刺”把那直升机轰下来! 快!

sentences.en: Frog would like to, perhaps this time will be put away Scorpion Stinger, so he agreed.
sentences.cn: 青蛙想, 也许蝎子这一次会收起毒刺, 于是就同意了.

sentences.en: Gaz: Soap, grab another Stinger and fire again ! Let put him to the test!
sentences.cn: 加斯: 索普, 再拿一支“毒刺”轰它! 看它是否能过关!

sentences.en: Q : And this, I'm particularly proud of - behind the headlights, stinger missiles!
sentences.cn: 还有这个, 我特别自豪,因为在车灯后面是“毒刺”导弹!

sentences.en: Real Army weapons & vehicles: Apache helicopter , Stryker , M 4 A 1 rifle , Stinger missiles, etc.
sentences.cn: 真实的美军武器 & 交通工具: 阿帕奇直升机, M4A1, 等等.

sentences.en: This nightmare of a dentist's drill was tapered like a bee's stinger.
sentences.cn: 这枚钻头形同蜜蜂的蛰针,让你恐怖地联想到牙医的钻头.

words.tran_cn: 激烈的；刺人的；刺一样的
吝啬的，小气的；有刺的；缺乏的
讽刺者；好讽刺人的人；有刺的动物；鸡尾酒

trans.tran_cn: 刺激者，讽刺者，螫针，蜇针
trans.tran_en: the sharp needle-shaped part of an insect’s or animal’s body, with which it stings you
